Complete MCP server exposing all SecurityScorecard Tool operations to AI agents. Zero configuration needed - all 19 operations pre-built.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
3. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
4. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **Tool Nodes**: Pre-configured for every SecurityScorecard Tool operation
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Uses official n8n SecurityScorecard Tool tool with full error handling

‚Ä¢ **Get a company's score improvement plan**

### üîß Industry (3 operations)

### üîß Invite (1 operations)

### üîß Portfolio (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Update a portfolio**

### üîß Portfoliocompany (3 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Add a portfolio company**

‚Ä¢ **Remove a portfolio company**

### üîß Report (3 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Download a report**
‚Ä¢ **Generate a report**

‚Ä¢ Content and data payloads
‚Ä¢ Configuration options

**Response Format**: Native SecurityScorecard Tool API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n error management and retry logic

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **Other n8n Workflows**: Call MCP tools from any workflow
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints
